capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been the caretaker for years, but his strict rules and constant grumpiness have led to him being somewhat of an outsider among the students and faculty. It's interesting to note that despite this, he does seem to have a certain level of affiliation with the Hoggywarts community, even if it's not always apparent.
